title: Will wifi 6 be enabled on pixel 4?
content:
Hi
I see that the Snapdragon 855 has WiFi 6 support, but the pixel 4 phones are just advertised with WiFi 5 / 802.11ac support.
Why?? Will wifi 6 be enabled in a later update?
I'm considering buying a pixel 4, but I really want wifi 6.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
